Transcription for 546206

Joseph S Hannah
and bless her by you.
Silent night, holy night,
all is calm, all is bright.
Proud yon Virgin, wild and child,
Holy infant so tender and mild.
Sleep in heavenly peace,
sleep in heavenly peace.
Silent night, holy night,
shepherds quake at the sight,
glory stream from heaven afar.
Heavenly hosts sing Alleluia,
Christ the Savior is born,
Christ the Savior is born.
Thou well-nosed, sound and host,
Thine alone, Thine alone host,
sing of love with total might,
All I feel, my heart at one.
Well and blessed by you,
well and blessed by you.
